titles.title: I Know Whom I Have Believed

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I know not why God’s wondrous grace To me He hath made known, Nor why, unworthy--Christ in love Redeemed me for His own.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: But “I know whom I have believed, And am persuaded that He is able To keep that which I’ve committed Unto Him against that day.”

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I know not how this saving faith To me He did impart, Nor how believing in His Word Wrought peace within my heart.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I know not how the Spirit moves, Convincing men of sin, Revealing Jesus thro' His Word, Creating faith in Him.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I know not when my Lord may come, At night or noonday fair, Nor if I walk the vale with Him, Or "meet Him in the air."
